long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Immerse yourself in the epic world of Final Fantasy with our live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A sleek interface inspired by the iconic aesthetics of Final Fantasy.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay on schedule with a stylish display that complements the fantasy theme.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Enjoy fantasy-themed games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Expand your experience with tools that enhance your journey through the Final Fantasy universe.
